label: Take a contract
tooltip: Immediately takes a contract by ID with optional parameters for employer, target, system, map, and difficulty. Unspecified parameters will be randomly selected with intelligent defaults.

inputs.label: Contract Id
inputs.tooltip: Contract override ID to start (e.g. SimpleBattle_LastMechStanding, flashpoint_escort)

inputs.label: Employer
inputs.tooltip: [OPTIONAL] Employer faction name (e.g. Davion, Kurita). If not provided, a random valid employer for the system will be selected

inputs.label: Target
inputs.tooltip: [OPTIONAL] Target faction name (e.g. Kurita, Pirates). If not provided, a random valid enemy of the employer will be selected

inputs.label: Target System
inputs.tooltip: [OPTIONAL] System ID where the contract takes place (e.g. starsystemdef_Itrom). Defaults to current system

inputs.label: Map Id
inputs.tooltip: [OPTIONAL] Specific map path to use for the contract. If not provided, a random valid map for the system will be selected

inputs.label: Difficulty
inputs.tooltip: [OPTIONAL] Difficulty value for the contract. If not provided, a player-appropriate difficulty will be calculated based on GlobalDifficulty and system rating

inputs.label: Immediately Close Conversation
inputs.tooltip: If true, the conversation will be closed before showing the contract negotiation screen. This allows the contract UI to display properly
